data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Hakkari to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hakkari, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hakkari to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Hakkari that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Hakkari, Turkey to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Abkhaz people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Hakkari, Turkey from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 102 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Hakkari to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

location.name: Hakkari
